name: Pokémon Delta Fusion
overview: Description Pokemon Delta Fusion is a hack of Pokemon Fire Red. This version has mostly Fakemon that have been created by fusing two or more sprites of your old favorites. 12 years ago, in a remote region, a group of scientists discovered a huge secret. They discovered the the missing link in order to splice the DNA of Pokémon in order to create new species. All the scientists agreed that the results were to be taken to their graves, with one exception. From that day on, the last scientist, Dr. Cleanse was determined to use his power on the fusion Pokémon to genetically eliminate a Pokémon species who said “less than human”. He created a team of gangsters who support their case with known team Erase. There was a tense struggle and a lot of life, but in the end, Dr. Cleanse was defeated. But before he died, he betrayed that he had chosen a newcomer. His threat was forgotten, everything went well until 12 years later when his disciple made his grand appearance. About that time, a young teenager SproutVillage embarks on an adventure Pokémon becomes adult and finds the missing dad. We just warned them what to do. Features: • Fakemon • Non-Fakemon • New characters and maps • Different events will happen continuously
